pli-tv-bu-vb-pc75:1.1_0: Tena samayena buddho bhagavā sāvatthiyaṁ viharati jetavane anāthapiṇḍikassa ārāme.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc75:1.2_0: Tena kho pana samayena chabbaggiyā bhikkhū kupitā anattamanā sattarasavaggiyānaṁ bhikkhūnaṁ talasattikaṁ uggiranti.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc75:1.6_1: chabbaggiyā bhikkhū kupitā anattamanā amhākaṁ talasattikaṁ uggirantī”ti.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc75:1.7_0: Ye te bhikkhū appicchā …pe… te ujjhāyanti khiyyanti vipācenti—
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc75:1.8_0: “kathañhi nāma chabbaggiyā bhikkhū kupitā anattamanā sattarasavaggiyānaṁ bhikkhūnaṁ talasattikaṁ uggirissantī”ti …pe…
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc75:1.9_1: kupitā anattamanā sattarasavaggiyānaṁ bhikkhūnaṁ talasattikaṁ uggirathā”ti?
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc75:1.12_1: kupitā anattamanā sattarasavaggiyānaṁ bhikkhūnaṁ talasattikaṁ uggirissatha.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc75:1.15.1_0: “Yo pana bhikkhu bhikkhussa kupito anattamano talasattikaṁ uggireyya, pācittiyan”ti.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc75:2.1.10_0: kāyaṁ vā kāyapaṭibaddhaṁ vā antamaso uppalapattampi uccāreti, āpatti pācittiyassa.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc75:2.2.1_0: Upasampanne upasampannasaññī kupito anattamano talasattikaṁ uggirati, āpatti pācittiyassa.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc75:2.2.2_0: Upasampanne vematiko kupito anattamano talasattikaṁ uggirati, āpatti pācittiyassa.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc75:2.2.3_0: Upasampanne anupasampannasaññī kupito anattamano talasattikaṁ uggirati, āpatti pācittiyassa.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc75:2.2.4_0: Anupasampannassa kupito anattamano talasattikaṁ uggirati, āpatti dukkaṭassa.
